details: Learn the basics of programming using the C language. Explore variables, loops, and functions. Gain a strong foundation in C programming concepts.
Study fundamental algorithms and data structures. Understand algorithm design and analysis. Solve complex problems using efficient algorithms.
Learn C++ programming in the context of Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). Implement DSA concepts in C++ for efficient problem-solving.
Explore essential data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Understand their operations and when to use them in programming.
Master Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles in Python. Create classes, objects, and reusable code. Build Python applications using OOP concepts.
Learn the principles of software engineering. Explore software development methodologies, project management, and software quality assurance.
Get hands-on experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS). Learn about cloud computing, AWS services, and deployment strategies.
Understand the fundamentals of relational databases using MySQL. Learn SQL queries, database design, and data manipulation.
Enhance your problem-solving skills. Practice solving coding challenges, puzzles, and algorithmic problems to prepare for technical interviews.
